alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 4:56PM CDT until June 01 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... North central Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 456 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Moore, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southern Oklahoma City, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, Valley Brook, and Tinker Air Force Base. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
